mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(ID, PWD, NAME, STORE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, PHONE, VAT_RATIO, DETAIL, IMAGE, AUTH) VALUES(#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{store}, #{email}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{vat_ratio}, #{detail}, 'noimage.png', 3)
mapper.select: SELECT ID, PWD, NAME, STORE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, PHONE, VAT_RATIO, DETAIL, IMAGE, AUTH FROM MEMBER ORDER BY NAME DESC
UPDATE MEMBER SET email = #{email}, address = #{address}, phone = #{phone}, detail = #{detail}, image = #{image} where ID=#{id}
